value.name: Fatal bike/car crash on NE Prescott at 57th
value.description: Voepel told Blue that it appeared the man operating the bicycle “made an error”. Police spokesperson Mary Wheat told The Oregonian that, “it appeared that the driver of the vehicle had the right of way.” This is NE 57th approaching Prescott with ...

value.name: Hendricks latest through revolving door at PPB Traffic Division
value.description: Hendricks will move into an Assistant Chief position working alongside new Police Chief Mike Reese. According to PPB spokesperson Mary Wheat, a new Captain for the Traffic Division has not been named. We’ll keep you posted on who gets the job.
